solution_line_template: Hansel makes ${hansel_initial_salary} and received a {hansel_raise_percent_num}% raise so his raise is {hansel_initial_salary}*{hansel_raise_percent_decimal} = ${hansel_raise_amount}
Gretel makes ${gretel_initial_salary} and received a {gretel_raise_percent_num}% raise so her raise is {gretel_initial_salary}*{gretel_raise_percent_decimal} = ${gretel_raise_amount}

If Gretel makes ${gretel_new_salary} a year and Hansel makes ${hansel_new_salary} then Gretel makes {gretel_new_salary}-{hansel_new_salary} = $<<{gretel_new_salary}-{hansel_new_salary}={gretel_more_money}>>{gretel_more_money} more a year than Hansel
